none.description:
{Divine Spirit}

School: Earth, Water
Proficiency: None.

{green|Bless}:
Mass Mirth and Sorrow spells at the beginning of each battle;
Mixing creaturs of neutral and good factions without penalty to morale.

{red|Curse}:
-10% Power,
-10% Knowledge,
-100 maximum movement points,
 -5% experience gain.

{#6d38ff|Ingredients} costs:
-200 gold.

{#38e8ff|Duration}:
All the effects remain until next week.
